explanation: [0-0] A young lady with bright green long hair stands in front of a grey background. She wears a grey rabbit hat, her eyes closed. She wears a dark grey top, her fingernails painted red, holding the ends of the hat with both hands.
[0-2] Then, a tomato appears from the top of the screen and slowly falls. The lady opens her eyes, opens her mouth wide, and eats the tomato.
[0-2] Then, a tomato appears from the top of the screen and slowly falls. The lady opens her eyes, opens her mouth wide, and eats the tomato.

[2-4] Immediately after, a grilled sausage appears at the top of the screen. The lady, with her eyes closed, squeezes the ends of the hat with both hands, causing the rabbit ears to stand upright, and the sausage disappears. Subsequently, a steak appears at the top of the screen. The lady, with her eyes closed, squeezes the ends of the hat again, the rabbit ears stand upright again, and the steak vanishes.

[4-7] Afterwards, a yellow onion appears at the top of the screen. The lady closes her eyes again and squeezes the ends of the hat once more. The rabbit ears stand upright again, and the onion disappears. Then, a bunch of purple grapes appears at the top of the screen. The lady opens her eyes, opens her mouth wide, and eats the grapes.

[11-14] Subsequently, a piece of meat on the bone appears at the top of the screen. The lady squeezes the ends of the hat again, the rabbit ears stand upright again, and the meat disappears. Finally, a veggie burger appears at the top of the screen. The lady opens her eyes, her mouth slightly open, as the burger falls, obscuring her face. There is green text "VEGAN" on the burger.
